content: sugar tree becky herrick snippet long squishy warm and colorful this scarf is a great way to use up scraps of yarn left over from your myriad other projects it s the crazy quilt of scarves size one size easily modified measurements 6 x 88 /15 x 223 5 cm yarn scraps of various weights and colors sport dk worsted and aran weight yarns in coordinating color combinations are recommended yardage at least 6 yards of each yarn approximately 360 yards total gauge 14 sts and 32 row per 4 /10 cm square in garter stitch note that gauge changes drastically from row to row as yarn types are changed needles and notions 45 or 60 circulars size us 10 6 mm construction notes this scarf is knit end to end in long garter stitch row leaving fringe on the two edges means never having to weave in ends snippet ©2015 becky herrick -
